summary: Completed frontend testing for coach dashboard UI/UX changes. All 10 requested features verified working correctly.

issues: Minor Recharts warning: 'width(-1) and height(-1) should be greater than 0' - cosmetic issue in console, does not affect functionality

home_button_navigation.details: Home button (data-testid='nav-home-btn') navigates to /coach/dashboard for coach users. Verified by navigating away to My Development and clicking Home to return.

coach_dashboard_page.details: Coach dashboard page displays correctly at /coach/dashboard. Shows profile card, targets, upcoming observations, and recent session.

reflection_banner_close_button.details: Reflection banner has close button (X) with data-testid='dismiss-reflection-prompt-btn'. Clicking it successfully dismisses the banner.

my_sessions_green_notification_dot.details: My Sessions tab has GREEN notification dot (bg-green-500 class) with data-testid='sessions-notification-dot'. Changed from blue to green.

three_column_metrics_row.details: My Coaching tab shows 3-column metrics row: Sessions Observed (12), Avg Ball Rolling (35%), Avg Interventions (2) - all displayed in same row.

intervention_filter_checkboxes.details: Intervention Distribution card has filter checkboxes above the chart for Command, Q&A, and Guided Discovery. data-testids: filter-command, filter-q&a, filter-guided-discovery.

filters_checked_by_default.details: All intervention filters are checked by default when page loads. Verified Command filter is_checked() returns True.

unchecking_filter_updates_chart.details: Unchecking a filter removes that intervention from the bar chart. Tested by unchecking Command - chart updated to show only Q&A and Guided Discovery bars.

archived_targets_collapsed_default.details: Archived targets section is collapsed by default on page load. After archiving a target and reloading page, the section shows collapsed with down chevron, content hidden.

archived_targets_restore_delete_buttons.details: Archived targets have both Restore button (data-testid='restore-target-{id}') and Delete button (trash icon, data-testid='delete-target-{id}') visible when section is expanded.

seed_data_creation: None - used existing test data, restored archived targets after testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: All UI/UX changes verified: Home button navigates to /coach/dashboard, reflection banner has close button (X), My Sessions tab has GREEN notification dot, 3-column metrics row (Sessions Observed, Avg Ball Rolling, Avg Interventions), Intervention Distribution has filter checkboxes that update chart when toggled, Archived targets section collapsed by default with both Restore and Delete buttons available when expanded. Minor Recharts console warning persists but doesn't affect functionality.
